channel.title: [PI] Connecting Error?
channel.description:
When one of my feinds tried to connect form a Vista computer he go this error
java.lang.NullPointerException at java.io.File.<init>(Unknown Source) at Update.<init>(Update.java:25) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4325) at client.startUp(client.java:8146) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5583) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .
Can anyone help with this??
